name: Scene Assembler
description: Combine scenes into episodes with optimal pacing
author: raymAIzing film

inputs.label: Scene List
inputs.placeholder:
Scene 1: INT. OFFICE - DAY
Scene 2: EXT. STREET - NIGHT...

steps.prompt:
Assemble Episode {{episodeNumber}}:

SCENES:
{{sceneList}}

PACING: {{pacing}}
TARGET DURATION: {{totalDuration}}

Provide:

## OPTIMAL SCENE ORDER
| Order | Scene | Duration | Cumulative |
|-------|-------|----------|------------|
| 1 | Scene X | 2:30 | 2:30 |
[Continue for all scenes]

## TRANSITION RECOMMENDATIONS
Between each scene:
- Scene X â†’ Scene Y: [Transition type] - [Reason]

## PACING ADJUSTMENTS
- Scenes to extend: [List with reasons]
- Scenes to trim: [List with reasons]
- Scenes to reorder: [If any]

## CUT POINTS
For each scene:
- Scene X: Cut at [timestamp] because [reason]

## MUSIC CUE PLACEMENT
| Timecode | Music Cue | Mood | Duration |
|----------|-----------|------|----------|
| 0:00 | Opening theme | Epic | 0:30 |
[Continue]

## TITLE CARD/CREDITS
- Opening title: [Timing and style]
- End credits: [Timing and style]

## EPISODE FLOW DIAGRAM
[Visual representation of emotional arc]

## FINAL RUNTIME
- Estimated total: [Time]
- Adjustment needed: [If any]
